text: "What It Feels Like for a Girl" is a 2001 song by Madonna and is the third and final single from her eighth studio album Music. It went to number 7 in the United Kingdom and Scotland, number 23 in the United States, number 1 in Spain, number 15 in New Zealand, number 18 in Ireland, number 3 in Iceland, Romania, Portugal and Argentina, number 2 in Italy and Canada and number 4 in Greece and Croatia. == Track listings and formats == *Japanese and US CD maxi- single #
